alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:16PM CST until further notice by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Henry affecting Marshall and Putnam Counties. Illinois River near Havana affecting Cass, Mason and Fulton Counties. Illinois River at Beardstown affecting Cass, Brown, Morgan and Schuyler Counties. Illinois River at Peoria affecting Woodford, Peoria and Tazewell Counties. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Ice is moving through the channel so fluctuations in the reading and forecast are possible. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Henry. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Water begins to affect the marina in Henry along with minor flooding of land adjacent to the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 23.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM CST Saturday was 23.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 26.0 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Illinois River Henry 23.0 23.5 Sat 7 pm CST 24.5 25.4 25.8 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to remain aware of the latest forecasts and associated flood risk for their area. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
